rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with a small waiting area and storage for shoes and coats.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with Mediterranean-style decor including exposed brick accents, stone finishes, and large windows facing the front facade. Includes a balcony that opens to a small garden.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering seating arrangements for family meals. Features natural lighting with Vastu-aligned south or east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with Mediterranean design aesthetics, featuring ample cabinetry and a breakfast nook that opens onto the balcony area if applicable.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom on the ground floor with a dedicated en-suite bathroom. Balcony access available for personal relaxation and natural light as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest bedroom designed with Mediterranean-style decor, private balcony to enjoy the view.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and air flow in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Spacious balconies that provide an outdoor living area and adhere to local design norms for ventilation and sunlight.
